title: S3 Replication Rule Created
description: Detects the creation or update of S3 Replication configurations. Attackers may set up automatic replication to copy all data from your bucket to an external bucket they control (Bulk Exfiltration).
author: Antigravity
false_positives: Legitimate Disaster Recovery (DR) setup. Validation required: Check if the destination bucket belongs to your organization.
recommendation: Inspect the 'ReplicationConfiguration'. Identify the destination bucket. If it is not one of your known backup locations, remove the rule immediately.
